description: This table contains common information from General Use Notes items. This table focuses on one time only data while other HNO tables (e.g., NOTES_ACCT, CODING_CLA_NOTES) contain the data for different note types.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The note ID for the note record.

columns.name: RELEVANT_REC_EVENT_ID
columns.description: Holds the Events (IEV) record which contains records marked relevant to the Note such as problems, allergies, lab results, etc.

columns.name: GROUP_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the group note ID for notes that are created in a group documentation context.

columns.name: LETTER_DEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The letter destination category ID for the note. This column is only populated if this row is for a Customer Relationship Management letter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Portal


Print


Print and Portal


Patient Portal Retracted


Print and Portal Retracted

columns.name: LETTER_FINAL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the letter was finalized. This column is only populated if this row is for a Customer Relationship Management letter.

columns.name: HNO_RECORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Record type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PB Guarantor Note


PB Guarantor Letter


PB Insurance Follow-up Letter


PB Hospital Account Note


HB Guarantor Note


HB Hospital Account Note


HB Guarantor Letter


HB Hospital Account Letter


HB Liability Bucket Letter


HB Liability Bucket Note


HB Contractual History Note


EB Guarantor Note


Reg Financial Assistance Letter


Reg Financial Assistance Tracker Note


Reg Financial Assistance Case Note

columns.name: RFL_LETTER_ENC_CSN
columns.description: Stores the encounter in which the referral communication letter was written

columns.name: CONV_MSG_CID
columns.description: This item contains the Community ID (CID) of a related In Basket Message (EOW) record.

columns.name: OUTREACH_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the campaign outreach template that created the letter.

columns.name: SOURCE_EDITS_CSN
columns.description: Stores a Contact Serial Number (CSN) pointer to the General Use Notes (HNO) record that holds edits to the parent note while an attestation is in progress.

columns.name: EXT_DUP_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Autoreconciled extneral note duplicate source note

columns.name: EXT_DUP_NOTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Autoreconciled external note duplicate note type


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Same reference ID


Duplicate text


Same globally unique ID

columns.name: PARENT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The parent note ID of a soft-deleted transcription record.

columns.name: ACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether the note is active. This item is not populated for all notes.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive

columns.name: EXT_AUTHOR
columns.description: Name of the external note's author. The name is stored as pieces delimited by character 127 and is ordered as follows: Last Name, Last Name from Spouse, First Name, Middle Name, Last Name Prefix, Spouse Last Name Prefix, Title, Suffix, Academic Initials.

columns.name: NOTE_UPDATE_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The last time this note was received through Care Everywhere. The value of Received Assessment and Plan Existence Days (I DXC 17000) defines how long notes with this item set exist before they are deleted. Scheduled task Remove HNO Records (E1J 88032) deletes notes and all of their references that have not been received within the amount of days defined by Received Assessment and Plan Existence Days (I DXC 17000)  Received Assessment and Plan Existence Days (I DXC 17000) defaults to 30 days if not set.
